title: Best of The Herd: 06/19/2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 06/19/2020
description:
The Jamal Adams situation is why Sam Darnold is in trouble, a new ranking from Fox Bet shows that Mike McCarthy was not the problem in Green Bay, Mike Gundy can't handle global issues like this and PFF proves that Colin knows Quarterbacks. Guests: Ryen Russillo of The Ringer and FOX Sports College Football analyst Joel Klatt.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
